doc.previous: Lower Saxony also has a border with the Dutch provinces of Overijssel Drenthe and Groningen as well as part of the German North Sea coast
doc.after: Lower Saxony is divided into 38 districts Landkreise or simply Kreise  Furthermore there are ten urban districts
